com.example.syn_tax

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.syn_tax.Task

  • public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
    Task Class Feb 21, 2018 Task Object, has a title, description, id, status, latitude, longitude, photo, list of bids Also has a requester and provider.

      • Task

        public Task(java.lang.String title,
            java.lang.String description,
            User requester,
            java.lang.String status,
            User provider,
            java.lang.Double latitude,
            java.lang.Double longitude)
        A task should have a title, description, a requester, status
        Parameters:
        title - the name of the task
        description - a description of the task
        requester - the user that requested the task to be done
        status - the status of the task: requested, done, completed, or assigned
